name: Configure hours sectors
Water PH scale
format:
<svg id="meter">


    <g ng-repeat="(key, value) in phScale">
      
      <rect x="{{value.xpos}}" 
           y="{{value.ypos}}"
           width="{{value.width}}" height="{{value.height}}" style="fill:{{value.hexColor}}"  />
       
       <text x="{{value.xpos+value.width/2}}" y="{{value.ypos+value.height/2}}" dominant-baseline="central" text-anchor="middle"
            font-size="14" stroke-width="0" stroke="#000"
            fill="#f9fcfb" font-family="Montserrat" font-weight="bold">{{value.title}}</text>
    </g>
    
    <polyline fill="none" stroke="#389f76" stroke-width="2" 
            points="{{sectorXMinPH}},{{sectorPhY-2}} 
                    {{sectorXMinPH}},{{sectorPhY-6}} 
                    {{sectorXMaxPH}},{{sectorPhY-6}} 
                    {{sectorXMaxPH}},{{sectorPhY-2}}" />
    <g>               
        <polygon fill="{{currentPhColor}}" stroke="{{currentPhColor}}" stroke-width="1" 
            points="{{XcurrentPH}},{{YcurrentPH}}
                    {{XcurrentPH-triangleSize}},{{YcurrentPH+triangleSize}}
                    {{XcurrentPH+triangleSize}},{{YcurrentPH+triangleSize}}"/>

         <text x="{{XcurrentPH}}" y="{{YcurrentPH+triangleSize}}" 
                baseline-shift="-23px" 
                text-anchor="middle"
                fill="{{currentPhColor}}" font-family="Montserrat" 
                font-size="1.5em" >{{currentPHValue}}
                
        </text>
        
        <text x="{{XcurrentPH}}" y="{{YcurrentPH+triangleSize}}" 
              dx="9%" baseline-shift="-23px"  text-anchor="start" 
              alignment-baseline="bottom" fill="{{currentPhColor}}" 
              font-size="1em" font-family="Montserrat">{{currentPhStatus}}</text>
       
    </g> 
  </svg>


<script>
    
(function(scope) {
    
     scope.phScale = 
        [{
            "title": "1",
            "hexColor": "#ec5656",
            "level": "Acidic"
        }, 
        {  
            "title": "2",
            "hexColor": "#f49a50",
            "level": "Acidic"
        },
        {
            "title": "3",
            "hexColor": "#f2c957",
            "level": "Acidic"
        },
        {  
            "title": "4",
            "hexColor": "#9dc248",
            "level": "Acidic"
        },
        {  
            "title": "5",
            "hexColor": "#1dae68",
            "level": "Acidic"
        },
        {  
            "title": "6",
            "hexColor": "#4bb752",
            "level": "Acidic"
        },
        {  
            "title": "7",
            "hexColor": "#3d9e7a",
            "level": "Neutral"
        },
        {  
            "title": "8",
            "hexColor": "#316784",
            "level": "Base"
        },
        {  
            "title": "9",
            "hexColor": "#325aa9",
            "level": "Base"
        },
        {  
            "title": "10",
            "hexColor": "#9a53dd",
            "level": "Base"
        },
        {  
            "title": "11+",
            "hexColor": "#571f82",
            "level": "Base"
        }]; 
    
    // $watch fires each time the node is triggered in the flow
    scope.$watch('msg', function(msg) {
        
        if (msg) {
            
            var phWidth = 25, phHeight = 25;
            var phInitialPadding = 25;
            var phSpacing = 3;
            var phYpos = 15;
            
            
            angular.forEach(scope.phScale, function (value, key) {
                
                value["xpos"] = key * phWidth + key * phSpacing + phInitialPadding;
                value["ypos"] = phYpos;
                value["width"] = phWidth; 
                value["height"]= phHeight; 
                
            });
            
            var sectorMinPh = msg.minPH;
            var sectorMaxPh = msg.maxPH;
            
            if (sectorMaxPh >= 12) {
                sectorMaxPh = 11.9;
            }
            
            
            scope.sectorXMinPH = (Math.floor(sectorMinPh)-1) * phWidth + (Math.floor(sectorMinPh)-1) * phSpacing + phInitialPadding + ((sectorMinPh % 1) * phWidth);
            scope.sectorXMaxPH = (Math.floor(sectorMaxPh)-1) * phWidth + (Math.floor(sectorMaxPh)-1) * phSpacing + phInitialPadding + ((sectorMaxPh % 1) * phWidth);
            scope.sectorPhY = phYpos;
            
            // Find PH or default to 7 (it happens when updating min or max PH sectors)
            scope.currentPHValue = (msg.payload) ? Number.parseFloat(msg.payload).toFixed(2) : 7;
            scope.XcurrentPH = (Math.floor(scope.currentPHValue)-1) * phWidth + (Math.floor(scope.currentPHValue)-1) * phSpacing + phInitialPadding + ((scope.currentPHValue % 1) * phWidth);
            scope.YcurrentPH = phYpos + phHeight + 5;
            scope.triangleSize = 4;
            
    
            if (scope.currentPHValue >= sectorMinPh && scope.currentPHValue <= sectorMaxPh) { 
                scope.currentPhStatus = "Optimal";
                scope.currentPhColor = "#42a37a";
            } else {
                scope.currentPhStatus = scope.phScale[Math.floor(scope.currentPHValue) + 1]["level"];
                scope.currentPhColor = "#ec3d49";
            }
            
            
        }
    });
    
})(scope);

</script>

name: Update seed and NFT arrays
DEBUG - reset seed nursary storage test
NFT - State
format:
<svg height="{{svgHeight}}">

    <g ng-repeat="(key, value) in NFT">
      
    <polyline points="{{value.x1}} {{value.y1}} {{value.x2}} {{value.y2}} 
        {{value.x3}} {{value.y3}} {{value.x4}} {{value.y4}} {{value.x5}} {{value.y5}}" stroke="black" 
      stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" fill="none" stroke-linejoin="round"/>
      
    </g>
    
    <g ng-repeat="(key, value) in NFTState">
      
        <rect x="{{value.xpos}}" 
               y="{{value.ypos}}"
               width="{{value.width}}" height="{{value.height}}" style="fill:{{value.hexColor}}" rx="150" />
    
        <image href="{{value.icon}}" x="{{value.xpos+value.width/4}}" y="{{value.ypos+value.height/4}}" 
          width="{{value.width/2}}" height="{{value.height/2}}" />
          
          
        <line    
            x1="{{value.progressX1}}"
            y1="{{value.progressY1}}"
            x2="{{value.progressXMax}}"
            y2="{{value.progressY1}}"
            stroke="black" 
            stroke-dasharray="100%" 
            stroke-dashoffset="50%" 
            stroke-width="2" />
            
        <line
            x1="{{value.progressX1}}"
            y1="{{value.progressY1}}"
            x2="{{value.progressX2}}"
            y2="{{value.progressY1}}"
            stroke="#C2E362" 
            stroke-dasharray="100%" 
            stroke-dashoffset="50%" 
            stroke-width="2" />
      
    </g>
    
    <g ng-repeat="(key, value) in rowsDisplay">
       
       <text x="{{value.xpos}}" y="{{value.ypos}}" dominant-baseline="central" text-anchor="middle"
            font-size="14" stroke-width="0" stroke="#000"
            fill="#f9fcfb" font-family="Montserrat" font-weight="bold">{{value.title}}</text>
    </g>
    
    <g ng-repeat="(key, value) in columnsDisplay">
       
       <text x="{{value.xpos}}" y="{{value.ypos}}" dominant-baseline="central" text-anchor="middle"
            font-size="14" stroke-width="0" stroke="#000"
            fill="#f9fcfb" font-family="Montserrat" font-weight="bold">{{value.title}}</text>
    </g>
    

  </svg>
  


<script>
    
(function(scope) {
    
    scope.rowsDisplay = []; 
    scope.columnsDisplay = []; 
    
    // $watch fires each time the node is triggered in the flow
    scope.$watch('msg', function(msg) {
        
        scope.NFTState = msg.NFTState;

        var boxWidth = 40, boxHeight = 40;
        var topPadding = 5;
        var leftPadding = 40;
        var boxSpacing = 5;
        var rowSpacing = 15;
        
        var numberofRows = msg.NFTRows;
        var numberofColumns = msg.NFTColumns; 
        
        scope.svgHeight = (topPadding+boxHeight) + (numberofRows * (boxHeight+rowSpacing) * 1.2) + "px";
        
        scope.NFT = [];
        var NFTpadding = 3;
        
        for (i = 1 ; i <= numberofRows ; i++) {
            var item = {
                x1: leftPadding - NFTpadding,
                y1: topPadding + boxHeight*i + rowSpacing*i - NFTpadding,
                x2: leftPadding+(numberofColumns) * boxWidth + boxSpacing*(numberofColumns) + NFTpadding,
                y2: topPadding + boxHeight*i + rowSpacing*i - NFTpadding,
                x3: leftPadding+(numberofColumns) * boxWidth + boxSpacing*(numberofColumns) + NFTpadding,
                y3: topPadding + boxHeight*(i+1) + rowSpacing*i + NFTpadding,
                x4: leftPadding - NFTpadding,
                y4: topPadding + boxHeight*(i+1) + rowSpacing*i + NFTpadding,
                x5: leftPadding - NFTpadding,
                y5: topPadding + boxHeight*i + rowSpacing*i - NFTpadding
            }
            scope.NFT.push(item);
        }
        
        angular.forEach(scope.NFTState, function (value, key) {
            value["xpos"] = (value["column"].toLowerCase().charCodeAt(0) - 97) * boxHeight + (value["column"].toLowerCase().charCodeAt(0) - 97) * boxSpacing + leftPadding;
            value["ypos"] = value["row"] * boxWidth + value["row"] * rowSpacing + topPadding;
            value["width"] = boxWidth; 
            value["height"]= boxHeight; 
            
            if (value["progress"]) { 
                
                value["progressX1"] = Math.floor((value["column"].toLowerCase().charCodeAt(0) - 97) * boxHeight + (value["column"].toLowerCase().charCodeAt(0) - 97) * boxSpacing + leftPadding + boxWidth/3);
                value["progressY1"] = Math.floor(value["row"] * boxWidth + value["row"] * rowSpacing + topPadding + boxHeight / 1.2);
                // Max - + 20px
                value["progressXMax"] = Math.floor((value["column"].toLowerCase().charCodeAt(0) - 97) * boxHeight + (value["column"].toLowerCase().charCodeAt(0) - 97) * boxSpacing + leftPadding + boxWidth/3 + (boxWidth / 3)); 
                // Prograss bar - 0.2 * % progress (100% = 20px)
                value["progressX2"] = Math.floor((value["column"].toLowerCase().charCodeAt(0) - 97) * boxHeight + (value["column"].toLowerCase().charCodeAt(0) - 97) * boxSpacing + leftPadding +  boxWidth/3 + (boxWidth / 3 / 100) * value["progress"]);
            }
            
        });

        
        scope.rowsDisplay = []; 
        for ( i = 0 ; i < numberofRows ; i++) {
            var feed = {
                "title": i+1,
                "xpos": leftPadding/2,
                "ypos": topPadding + (i+1) * boxHeight + (i+1) * rowSpacing + boxHeight/2
            }
            scope.rowsDisplay.push(feed);
        }
        
        scope.columnsDisplay = []; 
        for ( i = 0 ; i < numberofColumns ; i++) {
            var feed = {
                "title": String.fromCharCode(97 + i).toUpperCase(),
                "xpos": leftPadding + (i) * boxWidth + (i) * boxSpacing + boxWidth/2,
                "ypos": topPadding/0.2
            }
            scope.columnsDisplay.push(feed);
        }

        
    });

})(scope);

</script>

name: Save seedTray&NFT state and weekly data
Seed tray - crops planning
format:
<svg width="384px" height="200px">

    <g ng-repeat="(key, value) in seedTrayState">
      
      <rect x="{{value.xpos}}" 
           y="{{value.ypos}}"
           width="{{value.width}}" height="{{value.height}}" style="fill:{{value.hexColor}}" rx="10" />

      <image href="{{value.icon}}" x="{{value.xpos+value.width/4}}" y="{{value.ypos+value.height/4}}" 
      width="{{value.width/2}}" height="{{value.height/2}}" />
      
       <line    
            x1="{{value.progressX1}}"
            y1="{{value.progressY1}}"
            x2="{{value.progressXMax}}"
            y2="{{value.progressY1}}"
            stroke="black" 
            stroke-dasharray="100%" 
            stroke-dashoffset="50%" 
            stroke-width="2" />
            
        <line
            x1="{{value.progressX1}}"
            y1="{{value.progressY1}}"
            x2="{{value.progressX2}}"
            y2="{{value.progressY1}}"
            stroke="#C2E362" 
            stroke-dasharray="100%" 
            stroke-dashoffset="50%" 
            stroke-width="2" />
            
    </g>
    
    <g ng-repeat="(key, value) in rowsDisplay">
       
       <text x="{{value.xpos}}" y="{{value.ypos}}" dominant-baseline="central" text-anchor="middle"
            font-size="14" stroke-width="0" stroke="#000"
            fill="#f9fcfb" font-family="Montserrat" font-weight="bold">{{value.title}}</text>
    </g>
    
    <g ng-repeat="(key, value) in columnsDisplay">
       
       <text x="{{value.xpos}}" y="{{value.ypos}}" dominant-baseline="central" text-anchor="middle"
            font-size="14" stroke-width="0" stroke="#000"
            fill="#f9fcfb" font-family="Montserrat" font-weight="bold">{{value.title}}</text>
    </g>
    

  </svg>
  
   <svg height="45px">
       
       <circle cx="62" cy="22" r="12" stroke="green" stroke-width="3" fill="green"></circle>
       <image href="http://raspberrypi.local:1880/seed_state.png" x="50" y="10" width="20" height="20" />
       <text x="80" y="28" font-family="Roboto" fill="#f9fcfb">Seed</text>
       
        <circle cx="135" cy="22" r="12" stroke="green" stroke-width="3" fill="green"></circle>
       <image href="http://raspberrypi.local:1880/germinating-state.png" x="125" y="10" width="20" height="20" />
       <text x="155" y="28" font-family="Roboto" fill="#f9fcfb">Germinated</text>
        
      <circle cx="254" cy="22" r="12" stroke="green" stroke-width="3" fill="green"></circle>
      <image href="http://raspberrypi.local:1880/germinated-state.png" x="242" y="10" width="20" height="20"></image>
      <text x="275" y="28" font-family="Roboto" fill="#f9fcfb">Growing</text>
      
   </svg>
  

<script>
    
(function(scope) {
    
    scope.rowsDisplay = []; 
    scope.columnsDisplay = []; 
    
    // $watch fires each time the node is triggered in the flow
    scope.$watch('msg', function(msg) {
        
        scope.seedTrayState = msg.seedTrayState;
        
        var boxWidth = 40, boxHeight = 40;
        var leftPadding = 25;
        var boxSpacing = 5;
        var topPadding = 5;
        
        var numberofRows = msg.SeedTrayRows;
        var numberofColumns = msg.SeedTrayColumns; 
        
        
        angular.forEach(scope.seedTrayState, function (value, key) {
            value["xpos"] = (value["column"].toLowerCase().charCodeAt(0) - 96) * boxHeight + (value["column"].toLowerCase().charCodeAt(0) - 96) * boxSpacing + leftPadding;
            value["ypos"] = value["row"] * boxWidth + value["row"] * boxSpacing + topPadding;
            value["width"] = boxWidth; 
            value["height"]= boxHeight; 
            
            if (typeof value["progress"] != 'undefined' || value["progress"] != null) { 
                
                value["progressX1"] = Math.floor((value["column"].toLowerCase().charCodeAt(0) - 96) * boxHeight + (value["column"].toLowerCase().charCodeAt(0) - 96) * boxSpacing + leftPadding + boxWidth/4);
                value["progressY1"] = Math.floor(value["row"] * boxWidth + value["row"] * boxSpacing + topPadding + boxHeight / 1.15);
                // Max - + 20px
                value["progressXMax"] = Math.floor((value["column"].toLowerCase().charCodeAt(0) - 96) * boxHeight + (value["column"].toLowerCase().charCodeAt(0) - 96) * boxSpacing + leftPadding + boxWidth/4 + (boxWidth / 2)); 
                // Prograss bar - 0.2 * % progress (100% = 20px)
                value["progressX2"] = Math.floor((value["column"].toLowerCase().charCodeAt(0) - 96) * boxHeight + (value["column"].toLowerCase().charCodeAt(0) - 96) * boxSpacing + leftPadding +  boxWidth/4 + (boxWidth / 2 / 100) * value["progress"]);
            }
            
            
        });
        
        
        scope.rowsDisplay = []; 
        for ( i = 0 ; i < numberofRows ; i++) {
            var feed = {
                "title": i+1,
                "xpos": leftPadding/0.65,
                "ypos": topPadding + (i+1) * boxHeight + (i+1) * boxSpacing + boxHeight/2
            }
            scope.rowsDisplay.push(feed);
        }
        
        scope.columnsDisplay = []; 
        for ( i = 0 ; i < numberofColumns ; i++) {
            var feed = {
                "title": String.fromCharCode(97 + i).toUpperCase(),
                "xpos": leftPadding + (i+1) * boxWidth + (i+1) * boxSpacing + boxWidth/2,
                "ypos": topPadding/0.2
            }
            scope.columnsDisplay.push(feed);
        }
      
    });

})(scope);

</script>

name: Extract iPhone location
## Switch on at sunset and if im home
Find Scene ID

Get all devices - Save as flow
Get all devices and save as flow
Fromat URL
Save as flow
Get all devices and save as flow
Get Status
Control device IR
Custom IR
info:
deviceType	commandType	Command	command parameter	Description

All home appliance types except Others	""	turnOn	default	every home appliance can be turned on by default

All home appliance types except Others	command	turnOff	default	every home appliance can be turned off by default

Others	customize	{user-defined button name}	default	all user-defined buttons must be configured with commandType=customize
Air Conditioner	command	setAll	{temperature},{mode},{fan speed},{power state}
e.g. 26,1,3,on	the unit of temperature is in celsius;
modes include 1 (auto), 2 (cool), 3 (dry), 4 (fan), 5 (heat);
fan speed includes 1 (auto), 2 (low), 3 (medium), 4 (high);
power state includes on and off
TV, IPTV/Streamer, Set Top Box	command	SetChannel	{channel number}, e.g. 15	set the TV channel to switch to
command	volumeAdd	default	volume up
command	volumeSub	default	volume down
command	channelAdd	default	next channel
command	channelSub	default	previous channel
DVD, Speaker	command	setMute	default	mute/unmute
command	FastForward	default	fast forward
command	Rewind	default	rewind
command	Next	default	next track
command	Previous	default	last track
command	Pause	default	pause
command	Play	default	play/resume
command	Stop	default	stop
Speaker	command	volumeAdd	default	volume up
command	volumeSub	default	volume down
Fan	command	swing	default	swing
command	timer	default	set timer
command	lowSpeed	default	set fan speed to low
command	middleSpeed	default	set fan speed to medium
command	highSpeed	default	set fan speed to high
Light	command	brightnessUp	default	brightness up
command	brightnessDown	default	brightness down
Note: Most of the devices support turnOn or turnOff, which are case-sensitive. For infrared remote devices, when you have created customized buttons, you must set commandType to customize, otherwise the command will not work. command needs to be set to the name of the customized button.

name: Water pump - status
template: Water pump runs for {{global.settings.water_pump.duration}} seconds. , or stops when seed tray is filled at >50%.

template: {{#global.seedTray.water.level.warning.low}} Water level is too low. {{/global.seedTray.water.level.warning.low}} {{#global.seedTray.water.level.warning.high}} Water level is too high. {{/global.seedTray.water.level.warning.high}}
